== Build libupnpx.a  ==

Before using the library you have to build the upnpx static library *libupnpx.a* 
 

*1. open the desired project with Xcode*
 * for xcode 3.n, use: [http://code.google.com/p/upnpx/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fprojects%2Fxcode3%2Fupnpx%2Fupnpx.xcodeproj ./upnpx/projects/xcode3/upnpx/upnpx.xcodeproj]

http://upnpx.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/locate_project.png

<br><br>
*2. select the scheme*
   * example: "Simulator 3.2 | Debug

http://upnpx.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/scheme.png

<br><br>
*3. Build*
   * The result is the upnpx static library: *libupnpx.a* (the location of the file depends on the chosen project and scheme)

http://upnpx.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/build_result.png
